channel.title: How can i add id-checker into my client?
channel.description: Hey, I made a custom client for my server using Galkon's base client. How can i make it so it shows ID's when you right click npcs, objects and items just like in silabs client?

item.title: How can i add id-checker into my client?
item.dc:creator: @ill4ev ill4ev
item.description:
@ill4ev wrote:

lol… It took me a few readthroughs to find out what the hell you were talking about… haha

Read full topic
item.source: How can i add id-checker into my client?

item.title: How can i add id-checker into my client?
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Hey, I did a personalized customer for my waiter using the basic customer of Galkon. How I can do it if it shows papers when you clink just npcs, the objects and the items like just in the customer of silabs?

Read full topic
